lead_paragraph: Sammy Sosa hit his 602nd career homer to break a fifth-inning tie, leading the visiting Texas Rangers to a 5-4 victory against Boston last night and spoiling Josh Beckett’s last start before the All-Star Game rosters are announced today.
snippet: Sammy Sosa hit his 602nd career homer to break a fifth-inning tie, leading the visiting Texas Rangers to a 5-4 victory against Boston last night and spoiling Josh Beckett’s last start before the All-Star Game rosters are announced today.
